nodes.title: Startup Landing Page
nodes.what: A landing page designed for showcasing startup features and attracting visitors.
nodes.how: Modern layout with header, hero, features section, testimonial section, and footer.

nodes.title: Header
nodes.what: The top section of the page containing logo and navigation.
nodes.how: Fixed header bar with a logo on the left and navigation items on the right.

nodes.title: Hero Section
nodes.what: Main attention-grabbing section with a call-to-action.
nodes.how: Prominent text area with a headline, subheading, and call-to-action button. Background image or gradient.

nodes.title: Features Section
nodes.what: Section displaying key features of the startup.
nodes.how: Grid layout with feature cards including icons, headings, and descriptions.

nodes.title: Testimonials Section
nodes.what: Section showcasing customer feedback to build credibility.
nodes.how: Carousel or grid layout with testimonial cards containing quotes, names, and profile pictures.

nodes.title: Footer
nodes.what: Bottom section containing additional navigation and copyright information.
nodes.how: Simple footer with links to privacy, terms, and social media icons.

nodes.title: Logo
nodes.how: SVG or image file with accessibility features like alt text.

nodes.title: Navigation Menu
nodes.what: Menu items for navigating different sections of the page.
nodes.how: Horizontal list of links with hover and active states.

nodes.title: Nav Item
nodes.how: Link element styled with hover effects.

nodes.title: Headline
nodes.what: Large heading text in the hero section.
nodes.how: Text element styled with large typography for emphasis.

nodes.title: Subheading
nodes.how: Smaller text element with secondary information.

nodes.title: Call-to-Action Button
nodes.what: Button to direct users to take action.
nodes.how: Styled button element with hover effects and a prominent color.

nodes.title: Feature Card
nodes.what: Individual card showing a specific feature.
nodes.how: Card with an icon, heading, and brief description.

nodes.title: Testimonial Card
nodes.what: Card with user feedback, profile picture, and name.
nodes.how: Container with quote text, image, and subtitle.

nodes.title: Footer Links
nodes.how: Horizontal or vertical list with links to company-related resources.

nodes.title: Social Links
nodes.what: Icons linking to social media profiles.
